title: Champion Concept: Ihroghaf. The Rune Mistress.
body:
**Name**: Ihroghaf  Pronounced Ih, Roh, Gaph
**Title**: _The Rune Mistress_ 
Nationality: Ionia. 
Race: Human
Gender: Female.
Build: Lanky 
Skin: Pale, freckled 


* HEALTH	535 (+55)	
* HEALTH REGEN.	5.5  (+0.5)	
* ATTACK SPEED 	0.625  (+2.112%)
* ATTACK DAMAGE	56 (+3)
* MANA	400 (+50)	
* MANA REGEN.	5 (+1)
* ARMOR	21.552 (+3)
* MAGIC RESIST  	25 (+0)
* RANGED	500	
* MOV. SPEED	335

Abilities

**Passive:**_ Chalk Dust. _
every 20 seconds. (reduced by 4.5 seconds per spell cast, reduced by 1.25 seconds per champion hit via auto attack) Ihroghaf next auto attack deals 40+ (5 X LVL) + (0.2 AP) bonus Magic damage and restores 3% of missing Mana (9% if an enemy champion is struck).  
If the unit hit is within a Runic circle, the Active effect of the Runic Circle is Re Triggered.  

> **Rune Rules **
> _All Runes have their range cast time and Linking radius increased per Level_
> 
> Cast Range 900 + (5.5 X LVL )           1000 at lvl 18
> Cast Time 0.6 - (0.027 X LVL )           0.1 at lvl 18
> Linking Radius 300 +  (11.1 X LVL)     500 at lvl 18
> 
> after the cast time a rune is created at targeted position with a radius of 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 / 200 + (0.1 AP)
> the Rune Persists until Ihroghaf leaves a 2500 unit radius of it or 8 seconds elapse. 
> 
> Linked Runes
> Casting a rune within the linking area will form straight lines to  join the two runes and cause their area of effects to overlap while multiple runes may be linked in this manner the area of effect only stretches to the next rune within the linking area 
> _(TLDR lines don't work infinitely however triangles and other shapes work)_
> 
> Stacked Runes
> Casting a rune On top of another rune causes the Initial rune to gain additional persistent effects. at the cost of the second rune not applying its cast effect.  this also increases the radius of the rune by 10 +(0.05 AP)


**Q:** _Rune Of Spite. _ 
**Cost:** 50 / 55 / 60/ 75 / 80 / 85 Mana
**Cooldown** 12 / 11.5 / 11 / 10.5 / 10 seconds

when the Rune of spite is formed it deals 65 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 190 + (0.45 AP) magic damage to all enemy units within the area, and Marks them for 2.5 seconds the next auto attack (from any Source) triggers and Consumes the mark dealing 20 / 30 / 60 / 120 / 220 + (0.2 AP) bonus magic damage. 

_Persistent effects _
While the Rune of Spite persists all enemy units on top of it take 5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 + (0.05 AP) magic damage each second. this damage increases by 50% for each second that the unit remains within the area stacks up to 5 times (leaving then re entering the area resets the stacking damage)
Allied units that are within the area deal 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 +( 0.075 AP) bonus magic damage on single target spells and Auto attacks. this damage is reduced by 75%  for AOE attacks and Damage over time effects, leaving the area removes this buff. 

> _Stacked Rune Effects_
> 
> **Q** _Rune Of Spite:_ While within the area all Enemy units who have been Marked and are auto attacked the mark is not consumed however the next proc of the mark deals 50% reduced damage stacking 3 times.   
> Allied Champions within the area deal an additional  10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 +( 0.15 AP) bonus magic damage over 3 seconds on single target spells and Auto attacks. this damage is reduced by 75%  for AOE attacks and Damage over time effects, leaving the area removes this buff. 
> 
> **W**_ Aegis Rune:_ Enemies within the area have their Magic resist reduced by  5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 per tick of Damage from the Persistent effect of Rune of Spite. this caps at 5 stacks.  Allied Champions Gain a shield equal to 20% of the damage they deal while they remain within the area this shield caps at 100 / 120 / 160 / 220 / 280 + (0.3 AP). 
> 
> **E** _Ensnaring Rune:_ Enemy units within the area are slowed by 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 + (0.01 AP) % with each tick from the Persistent effect of Rune of Spite. this caps at 5 stacks.  Allied Champions within the area Gain a  5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 % slow on on single target spells and Auto attacks. this slow is reduced by 50%  for AOE attacks and Damage over time effects, leaving the area removes this buff. 
 

**W** _Aegis Rune_
**Cost:** 50 / 55 / 60/ 75 / 80 / 85 Mana
**Cooldown** 12 / 11.5 / 11 / 10.5 / 10 seconds

enemies champions within the area when the rune is formed have their armor and magic resist reduced by 10 / 13 / 18 / 25 / 40 + (0.05 AP) this effect persists for 3 seconds after the champion leaves the runes area of effect. 
When the Rune is Formed Allied immediately gain a shield equal to 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 + (0.4 AP) this sheild lasts 3 seconds after the champion leaves the runes area of effect. 

_Persistent effects _
while within the Runes Area of effect allied champions  have their shields regenerate at a rate of  10 / 15 / 20 / 25  / 30 + (0.1 AP) per second. the shield can become overcharged up to 150% of the the initial shield. this decays over 3 seconds at of a rate of 17%  when exiting the runes area of effect.
Enemy Champions who remain within the runes area of effect have their damage output reduced by 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 + (0.01AP) this effect remains until the champion leaves the area of effect.  (this effect **does not** apply to true damage) 

> _Stacked Rune Effects_
> **Q** _Rune Of Spite:_Enemy units within the area of effect take  5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 + (0.05 AP) magic damage each second. this damage increases by 50% for each second that the unit remains within the area stacks up to 3 times (leaving then re entering the area resets the stacking damage)
> Allied Units Gain 1 / 3 / 5 / 7 / 10 Attack Damage and Ability power per 50 units of hp their shield has._ (eg their sheild has 230 units of hp  so they gain 4 stacks of attack damage and Ability power )_
> 
> **W**_ Aegis Rune:_ while within the area enemy champions receive Grievous wounds reducing healing by 50%
> Allied champions who enter the area gain a spell shield equal to 10 / 15 / 20 / 25  / 30 + (0.1 AP) once this shield breaks it cannot be reapplied by exiting and entering the area. 
> 
> **E** _Ensnaring Rune:_
> Enemy champion that enter the area receive a 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 % slow this slow lasts 3 seconds after leaving the area. the further the enemy champion travels from the rune the further their armor and magic resist is reduced by 0 at 0 units to 20 / 26 / 36 / 50 / 80 + (0.1 AP) at 900 units. 

    
**E** _Ensnaring Rune:_
**Cost:** 50 / 55 / 60/ 75 / 80 / 85 Mana
**Cooldown** 12 / 11.5 / 11 / 10.5 / 10 seconds

when the rune is formed Enemy Champions are snared for 0.5 / 0.75 / 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 seconds. 
when the rune is formed Allied champions receive a 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 % movement speed buff that deteriorates over 2.5 seconds after leaving the runes area. 

_Persistent effects _

Enemy Champions are bound slowing them by 5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15% while bound if they leave the area of effect the begin taking damage based on their distance from the center of the rune. the distance increases the severity of the slow and the damage dealt. champions receive 1 / 3 / 5 / 7 / 10 + (0.2 AP) magic damage per second at 0 units to  10 / 30 / 50 / 70 / 100 + (2 AP) magic damage and 10 / 25 / 50 / 75 / 99 % slow at 1000 units.  Leaving 1200 units will break the Binding.  (Knockback effects will cause the target to take damage equal to their new position). If the target exits the area they take 10 / 30 / 50 / 70 / 100 + (2 AP) magic damage.
Allied units within the area receive a 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 % movement speed increase while within the area. 

> _Stacked Rune Effects_
> 
> **Q** _Rune Of Spite:_
> Enemy champions that are bound take .25 / 3.25 / 5 / 6.125 / 7.5 + (0.025 AP) magic damage each second. this damage increases the greater the distance between the champion and the center of the rune, at 1000 units bound enemy champions take 10 / 15 / 20 / 25  / 30 + (0.1 AP) magic damage each second.
> Allied champions gain 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 % increased attack speed while within the area. leaving the area removes this buff 
> 
> **W**_ Aegis Rune:_
> Bound Enemies have their armor and magic resist reduced reduced scaling on distance between the champion and the center of the rune 0 at 0 units to 10 / 13 / 18 / 25 / 40 + (0.05 AP) at 1000 units  
> Allied champions within the area take 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 + (0.01AP)% reduced damage from bound champions this effect remains until the champion leaves the area of effect.  (this effect **does not** apply to true damage) 
> 
> **E** _Ensnaring Rune:_
> Enemies who are bound take an additional 1.5 / 4.5 / 7.5 / 10.5 / 15 + (0.3 AP) magic damage per second at 0 units to  15 / 45 / 75 / 105 / 150 + (5 AP) magic damage at 1000 units.
> Allied champions maintain the 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 % movement speed increase for 2.5 seconds after leaving the area 

**R** _Volatile power_
**Cost:** 200 / 250 / 300 Mana 
**Cooldown** 100 / 90 / 80 seconds
**Range** 300 units  to 1200 units
**Area of Effect** 60 Degrees to 0 Degrees (Base Width of 50  units) 
**Projectile Speed** Instantaneous, to  1500

1st Cast causes Ihroghaf to start channeling, anchoring Her for up to 8 seconds while charging Volatile power gains range and damage  but loses width of angle and Projectile Speed Max damage is achieved at 3 seconds of charging. 
2nd Cast releases the stored power in a bolt that travels through units dealing 80 / 120 / 160 + (0.1 AP) to 250 / 400 / 600 +( 0.8 AP) Magic Damage. if the bolt is cast over or travels over runes the bolt gains additional effects and  causes the bolt to strike all enemy units above the rune. this effect may trigger for each type of rune but cannot apply the same effect twice. (the bolt will carry effects for the rest of its journey, this means that while the bolt may hit a rune but it  will not trigger the effect until it passes over the rune) 
  if the bolt travels over runes the runes are consumed. 
 
>  **Q** _Rune Of Spite:_
>  50 / 150 / 300 + (0.5 AP) Bonus magic damage over 5 seconds  
>  **W**_Aegis Rune:_
>  10 / 15 / 25 % Spell Penetration 
>  **E** _Ensnaring Rune:_
>  Snares enemy units for 1 / 1.5 / 2 seconds

replies.body: You went absolutely HAM on this one! So many hours of effort put in to this! Must have a lot of spare time.
Lol yeah ive been thinking about this idea for a a while now, im pretty happy with the general concept,  some of the numbers probably could use some tweaking tho

I respect champion concept when I see a bunch of numbers, ratios, damage output types, base and level stats, multiple effects, a creative passive, and an epic name.
Now all we need is some deep lore to get stuck into! (Don't read that twice) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Oh i totaly forgot ~~not really just i didn't want to make that post too much of a essay~~ i'll include the lore in a comment for you guys :]

**Lore**:  Ihroghaf was always magically inclined, even when she was young.  levitating stones, summoning fire, destroying boulders. as her age grew and she learnt more of the arcane arts her powers drastically increased so much so that she had difficulty not using magic accidentally. when she turned 15 the league contacted Ionia, concerned that this child who used magic freely may in a few years cause damage on par to that of the battles of the rune wars.

Ionia listened to the decree made by the council of summoners her powers would have to be restricted lest she cause damage to the already ravaged landscape of Runtera.  the Ionian elders wizened from their mistakes controlling Syndra. they approached Ihroghaf and spoke frankly "your powers are dangerous and uncontrolled you lack restraint Ihroghaf! you must learn to control and restrain yourself." 
the landscape around them was in turmoil boulders floating high into the sky bright lights sparking igniting nearby plants. Ihroghaf  terrified that she might hurt the elders or those around her, agreed and was placed under the tutelage of a old sage. 

the sage taught her to use mystical runes to contain her power.  runes, require the greatest of control it took an age but she finally managed to seal most of her power just in time too, the council came to Ionia with the express purpose,  to take Ihroghaf into  custody. to their surprise when they came. Ihroghaf willingly accepted their binding to the League. only to test the strength of their will.

Walking to the docks she released her self imposed bindings,  her power flourished out of the Guardian Sea rose the mighty vessel. torrents of water ascended into the sky shining in the early morning sun. 

she turned to the Summoners from the League and demanded "If you should bind me, then you must bind me with all your will." the summoners agape, she shouldn't have nearly enough power to even move a leaf upon the cobblestone. she continued "you are incapable of  Restraining me... So take me to the league, perhaps they can control me" 

The league reached an agreement.  Ihroghaf would maintain a constant binding to a summoner and in return she would act on the league's behalf to restrain "troublesome" Individuals. 

_"Beware Her Runes.  If they can hold her back, they can hold the world back"_  an Ionian citizen.
